body:
Well guys it's finally done! I decided not to replace the case or optical drives as I already have a midtower case which has optical drives. I decided to choose an SSD instead of an HDD because SSD's are much better for performance and I already have a 500GB External Hard Drive. My friend gave me 4GB of DDR3 RAM already so I only have to buy one piece of 4GB DDR3 RAM from A-Data. I also didn't buy an OS because my cousin lent me her Windows 7 Professional Disc. I can't wait till I get all the parts and I get to make it, it's gonna be so much fun! 
http://ca.pcpartpicker.com/p/BzqCFT

title: My Custom Gaming PC Build!!!!
